task_summary: The robot is tasked with reaching a towel laid out on a workspace, using visual perception to locate and approach the object, and precisely align before confirming successful contact.

task_long_description.overview: This episode shows a bimanual robotic arm operating in a tabletop workspace with a pink towel placed centrally on an artificial grass mat. The robot begins away from the towel, visually searches and localizes it, approaches from above, aligns itself for contact, and moves to a position indicating successful reach. No grasp or manipulation is intended; the objective is to accurately reach and make contact with the towel using sensor feedback to confirm success.
preconditions: Workspace is clear except for towel.
Robot arms are powered and homed.
Towel is visible in the workspace.
stepwise_plan: Verify visibility of towel in the field of view.
Detect the towel using visual sensors.
Approach and align with the towel to set final reach trajectory.
Confirm presence at towel using positional checks.
success_criteria: Robot reaches position at the towel.
No collision with workspace or unintended objects.
failure_and_recovery: Failure: Towel not detected → Retry scan up to 3 times.
Failure: Unable to approach or align → Abort and log error.
Failure: Move action timeout or inaccurate → Re-attempt or flag.
Perception noise or occlusion → Multiple scan retries within fallback.
task_long_description.termination: Episode ends when robot confirms presence at the towel or retries are exhausted.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the towel is visible in the workspace.
Actively scans workspace in raster pattern to locate towel.
Performs object detection to localize towel.
Robot approaches and aligns to the towel for precise reach.
Moves end-effector to the towel position.
Verifies robot is at the towel location.

failure_modes: Detection fails or returns incorrect location
recovery_strategy: Retry scan when towel not visible (up to 3 times)
Fallback to scan if detection fails
Abort or log errors if repeated failures persist
assumptions: Frames show full 'reach' episode with end-effector not grasping, strictly adhering to task instruction.
No manipulation or grasp phase present in visual evidence; only approach and reaching are performed.
Workspace expected to remain static; towel remains in same position across all frames.

expected_success_criteria: End-effector is visibly at towel in final frame.
No collisions or errors during approach.
